verbs.description: ryan madson a late addition to [V: bullpen] gets dodgers out of bases - loaded jam in game 4 the dodgers were celebrating another trip to the national league championship series after closing out the atlanta braves 6 - 2 in part because ryan madson a dodger all of five weeks executed an improbable fifth - inning escape dodgers los angeles dodgers los angeles times ryan madson
